AT.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
AT.description: In Stealth Inc 2 spielst du die Rolle eines Klons, der aus einer unheilvollen Hightech-Forschungseinrichtung flieht. Stealth Inc 2 stellt mit mehr als 60 vielseitigen Levels in einer großen Spielwelt sowohl deine Geschicklichkeit als auch deinen Verstand auf die Probe. Hinter jeder Ecke lauert der Tod, aber einer der Vorteile eines Lebens als Klon ist, dass der Tod nicht wirklich dauerhaft ist. Durch das Fehlen von Ladebildschirmen oder Leben, um die man sich sorgen müsste, werden Spieler ermutigt, aus ihrem unweigerlichen Dahinscheiden zu lernen, wie man die Laser, mörderischen Roboter und angsteinflößenden Endgegner in diesem ultimativ feindseligen Arbeitsumfeld umgeht.

AU.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
AU.description: In Stealth Inc 2, you play the role of a clone escaping a sinister and high-tech testing facility. Stealth Inc 2 tests both your brain and your reflexes over 60 varied levels linked together in a sprawling overworld. Death is never more than a few moments away, but one of the few advantages of being a clone is that death isn’t all that permanent. With no loading screens and no lives to worry about, players are encouraged to use their inevitable demise as a learning tool as they navigate lasers, homicidal robots and terrifying bosses in the ultimate hostile work environment.

BG.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones

With no loading screens and no lives to worry about, players are encouraged to use their inevitable demise as a learning tool as they navigate lasers, homicidal robots and terrifying bosses in the ultimate hostile work environment.

BE.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
BE.description: Dans Stealth 2, vous jouez un clone s'échappant d'une sinistre usine de test de haute technologie. Stealth Inc 2 met à l'épreuve vos réflexes et votre cerveau durant plus de 60 niveaux variés au sein d'un vaste univers détaillé. La mort n'est jamais très loin, mais l'un des rares avantages d'être un clone réside dans le fait que la mort n'est pas vraiment éternelle. Sans écrans de chargement ni vies, les joueurs sont encouragés à considérer leur funeste et inévitable destin comme un moyen d'apprentissage pour éviter les lasers, les robots assassins et les boss terrifiants qui pullulent dans le plus hostile des lieux de travail.

ES.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
ES.description: En Stealth Inc 2 te metes en la piel de un clon que debe escapar de unas siniestras instalaciones de pruebas de alta tecnología. Stealth Inc 2 pone a prueba tu cerebro y tus reflejos a lo largo de más de 60 niveles variados enlazados por un extenso supramundo. La muerte siempre está al acecho, pero una de las pocas ventajas de ser un clon es que esta no es tan permanente. Sin pantallas de carga ni vidas de las que preocuparse, el juego anima a los jugadores a usar su inevitable muerte como herramienta de aprendizaje mientras esquivan rayos láser, robots homicidas y jefes aterradores en el ambiente de trabajo hostil definitivo.

IT.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
IT.description: In Stealth Inc 2 giocherai nei panni di un clone in fuga da un laboratorio sinistro e altamente tecnologico. Stealth Inc 2 metterà alla prova la tua astuzia e i tuoi riflessi in più di 60 livelli differenti, uniti fra loro in un inframondo irregolare. La morte è sempre dietro l'angolo, ma uno dei vantaggi di essere un clone è che la morte non è qualcosa di permanente. Senza nessuna schermata di caricamento e nessuna vita di cui preoccuparsi, i giocatori vengono incoraggiati a usare la loro inevitabile fine come strumento di conoscenza, mentre sfuggono a laser, robot omicidi e boss terrificanti nell'ambiente di lavoro più ostile mai visto.

NL.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
NL.description: In Stealth Inc 2 speel je een kloon die ontsnapt uit een sinistere high-tech testfaciliteit. Stealth Inc 2 stelt zowel je brein als je reflexen op de proef in meer dan 60 afwisselende levels die aan elkaar zijn gekoppeld in een gedetailleerde speelomgeving. De dood zit je op de hielen, maar een van de voordelen van een kloon is dat de dood nooit permanent is. Zonder laadschermen en geen levens om je zorgen over te maken, worden spelers aangemoedigd om hun onvermijdelijke ondergang als leermiddel te gebruiken als ze lasers, moordlustige robots en angstaanjagende bazen ontwijken in de ultieme vijandige werkomgeving.

NZ.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
NZ.description: In Stealth Inc 2, you play the role of a clone escaping a sinister and high-tech testing facility. Stealth Inc 2 tests both your brain and your reflexes over 60 varied levels linked together in a sprawling overworld. Death is never more than a few moments away, but one of the few advantages of being a clone is that death isn’t all that permanent. With no loading screens and no lives to worry about, players are encouraged to use their inevitable demise as a learning tool as they navigate lasers, homicidal robots and terrifying bosses in the ultimate hostile work environment.

PL.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
PL.description: In Stealth Inc 2, you play the role of a clone escaping a sinister and high-tech testing facility. Stealth Inc 2 tests both your brain and your reflexes over 60 varied levels linked together in a sprawling overworld. Death is never more than a few moments away, but one of the few advantages of being a clone is that death isn’t all that permanent. With no loading screens and no lives to worry about, players are encouraged to use their inevitable demise as a learning tool as they navigate lasers, homicidal robots and terrifying bosses in the ultimate hostile work environment.

PT.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
PT.description: No Stealth Inc 2 assumes o papel de um clone que quer fugir de umas instalações de testes de alta tecnologia. Stealth Inc 2 põe à prova o teu cérebro e os teus reflexos em mais de 60 níveis variados, interligado por um mundo vasto. A morte nunca está a mais do que alguns momentos de distância, mas uma das poucas vantagens de se ser um clone é que a morte não é assim tão permanente. Sem ecrãs de carregamento e sem vidas para se preocuparem, os jogadores são encorajados a utilizar a sua morte inevitável como ferramenta de aprendizagem ao evitarem lasers, robôs homicidas e bosses assustadores no mais hostil de todos os ambientes de trabalho.

RU.name: Stealth Inc 2: A Game of Clones
RU.description: В Stealth Inc 2 вам предстоит играть в роли клона и совершить побег из зловещего и высокотехнологичного испытательного центра. Stealth Inc 2 испытает ваш ум и ваши рефлексы на более чем 60 разнообразных уровнях, объединяемых в пространный мир. Смерть всегда будет находиться от вас всего в нескольких мгновеньях, но одно из немногих преимуществ пребывания в образе клона – это то, что смерть не столь постоянна. Без загружающихся экранов и жизней, о которых следует беспокоиться, игроков поощряют использовать свою неизбежную кончину в качестве инструмента обучения по мере прохождения ими через лазеры, роботов-самоубийц и ужасных боссов в идеальной враждебной рабочей среде.

movies.name: Stealth Inc 2: трейлер, посвященный выходу игры
